actions.description: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

traits.description: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.name: Keen Smell

traits.description:
The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light

3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis

1/day each: control weather, gaseous form
traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
